00018 #ifndef __c_evlcom__
00019 #define __c_evlcom__
00020 
00021 #include "math_util.h"
00022 
00023 void    bessel(nec_complex z, nec_complex *j0, nec_complex *j0p);
00024 void    hankel(nec_complex z, nec_complex *h0, nec_complex *h0p);
00025 
00026 class c_evlcom
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         int m_jh;
00030         nec_float m_ck2, m_ck2sq, m_tkmag, m_tsmag, m_ck1r, m_zph, m_rho;
00031         nec_complex m_ct1, m_ct2, m_ct3, m_ck1, m_ck1sq, m_cksm;
00032 
00033         nec_complex m_contour_a, m_contour_b;
00034         
00035         /* compute integration parameter xlam=lambda from parameter t. */
00036         void lambda( nec_float t, nec_complex *xlam, nec_complex *dxlam ) const;
00037 
00038 
00039         /* gshank integrates the 6 sommerfeld integrals from start to */
00040         /* infinity (until convergence) in lambda.  at the break point, bk, */
00041         /* the step increment may be changed from dela to delb.  shank's */
00042         /* algorithm to accelerate convergence of a slowly converging series */
00043         /* is used */
00044         void gshank( nec_complex start, nec_complex dela, complex_array& sum,
00045                 int nans, complex_array& seed, int ibk, nec_complex bk, nec_complex delb );
00046 
00047 
00048         /* rom1 integrates the 6 sommerfeld integrals from m_contour_a to m_contour_b in lambda. */
00049         /* the method of variable interval width romberg integration is used. */
00050         void rom1( int n, complex_array& sum, int nx );
00051         
00052         /* saoa computes the integrand for each of the 6 sommerfeld */
00053         /* integrals for source and observer above ground */
00054         void saoa( nec_float t, complex_array& ans);
00055 
00056         /* evlua controls the integration contour in the complex */
00057         /* lambda plane for evaluation of the sommerfeld integrals */
00058         void evlua( nec_complex *erv, nec_complex *ezv,
00059                 nec_complex *erh, nec_complex *eph );
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif /* __c_evlcom__ */
